title: CSAV Practice Classroom for Enhancing Argument Analysis and Mathematical Writing

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Educational environment integrating logical structure visualization and writing training for mathematical problem-solving processes

learning_goals: Learners analyze the argumentation structure of given math problems with 80% accuracy using the CSAV tool.
Learners write systematic math essays of three or more paragraphs based on argumentation visualization results.
Learners improve argumentation structuring abilities by 20% or more based on peer feedback.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
